eventChains.title: Logistics Bottleneck
eventChains.description: Throughput is lagging behind production. Cargo queues are forming across the base.

choices.title: Expand Hubs
choices.description: Authorize rapid expansion of logistics infrastructure.

choices.title: Delay Expansion
choices.description: Absorb the congestion and keep budgets stable.

eventChains.title: Raider Ultimatum
eventChains.description: Hostile raiders offer a truce in exchange for tribute.

choices.title: Pay Off
choices.description: Provide a credit shipment to cool tensions.

choices.title: Fortify
choices.description: Invest in defense instead of tribute.

choices.title: Defy
choices.description: Reject demands and prepare for retaliation.

eventChains.title: Research Breakthrough
eventChains.description: A surge of insights could change the trajectory of the program.

choices.title: Fund Labs
choices.description: Reinvest to accelerate research pipelines.

choices.title: Share Findings
choices.description: Trade results for broader influence.

choices.title: Commercialize
choices.description: Convert knowledge into credit flows.

eventChains.title: Vector Prime
eventChains.description: A kinetic field pilot offers to reshape your logistics corridors.

choices.title: Offer Core Team Seat
choices.description: Commit resources to secure their allegiance.

choices.title: Commission a Short Contract
choices.description: A smaller deal for limited support.

choices.title: Apply Pressure
choices.description: Try to force compliance with minimal investment.

eventChains.title: Aegis Node
eventChains.description: A defensive specialist offers to fortify your perimeter mesh.

choices.title: Sign a Defense Pact
choices.description: Grant autonomy in exchange for protection.

choices.title: Hire Limited Guard
choices.description: Secure a smaller protection detail.

choices.title: Overrule
choices.description: Refuse terms and attempt to seize control.

eventChains.title: Quantum Forge
eventChains.description: A materials savant offers to tune your fabrication lattice.

choices.title: Forge Alliance
choices.description: Invest credits to scale fabrication gains.

choices.title: Manufacturing Contract
choices.description: Secure a smaller optimization pass.

choices.title: Exploit the Tech
choices.description: Attempt to extract the method without consent.

eventChains.title: Neuralis
eventChains.description: A cognition architect offers to accelerate your research mesh.

choices.title: Integrate Core Node
choices.description: Dedicate influence to embed Neuralis in your labs.

choices.title: Research Contract
choices.description: Purchase a limited advisory cycle.

choices.title: Exploit Insights
choices.description: Attempt to copy the methods without consent.

eventChains.title: Helios Arc
eventChains.description: An energy wielder offers to stabilize your power arrays.

choices.title: Form a Power Bond
choices.description: Invest credits to lock in a long-term boost.

choices.title: Power Contract
choices.description: Secure a shorter energy optimization cycle.

choices.title: Exploit Resonance
choices.description: Attempt to siphon power without consent.

eventChains.title: Void Runner
eventChains.description: A corridor smuggler offers to bend markets in your favor.

choices.title: Cut Them In
choices.description: Share profits to secure a lucrative partner.

choices.title: Limited Run
choices.description: Pay for a narrower boost.

choices.title: Squeeze the Runner
choices.description: Attempt to force market secrets out of them.
